title: Prone
content:
Prone Breaks Concentration. Can't move or take Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions. Attacks against a Prone target from within 3m has Advantage. Inflicts Disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws. A Prone creature must spend half its Movement Speed to stand up.
